title: Dušan Pantelić
text:
Dušan Pantelić (; born 15 April 1993) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for Hungarian club <a href="Budapest%20Honv%C3%A9d%20FC">Honvéd</a>.
Career.
Pantelić signed a contract with PAS Giannina on 20 January 2019.He released on a free transfer on 31 August 2019.He signed a contract with <a href="FK%20Radni%C4%8Dki%20Ni%C5%A1">FK Radnički Niš</a>.
On 9 July 2021, he signed a one-season contract with <a href="Budapest%20Honv%C3%A9d%20FC">Honvéd</a> in Hungary.
